subject: Trades (Sports)
Basketball
All Star Games
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. players, coaches and owners are descending on Phoenix for this weekend’s All-Star game, and possibly to pick over the remains of a once-proud franchise.
snippet: N.B.A. players, coaches and owners are descending on Phoenix for this weekend’s All-Star game, and possibly to pick over the remains of a once-proud franchise.
